website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a natural dishwasher detergent that also gets a lot of praise for how well it cleans, this is a good pick.
pros: A natural option that comes in pack form and is easy to use
Powered by plant-based enzymes instead of harsh detergents
Company uses vegan and eco-friendly ingredients and packaging
cons: Rare reports of clear glass dishes coming out of the wash looking dull or having a slight residue

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my dishes
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of a plant based detergent but I have to say that my dishes look great and no longer have a “chemical” aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad they released a new version that works wonderful
customer_reviews.text: So glad they released a new version that works wonderful. We use the leading traditional alternative and this one is is actually pretty close. Using the alternative it's perfectly dry and clean, this one leaves it still slightly wet with a little product on it it but can be wiped easily. To note, it's not a film left on (like the previous version), I think its more that it just doesn't dry as well as the leading chemical options. But it's like 95% there which is incredible since most of the green alternatives are usually healthy but have major performance issues. Highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a white residue
customer_reviews.text: It seems to clean everything fairly well, then it puts a white coating on glass. All of my glassware has small white spots on it once it comes out. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Frogmedic

customer_reviews.title: Foam Overkill
customer_reviews.text: Well this has never happened before with a different soap.... waste of $$
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Works way better than Cascade Complete!
customer_reviews.text: This product beat Cascade by a long-shot! I thought my new dishwasher was to blame for the gunk in the mugs in the top rack and overall poor cleaning job. I couldn't believe the difference when I opened my dishwasher after the first time I tried Puracy...it was sparkling clean and every item was clean...Yay! As it should be!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Nicklanovich

customer_reviews.title: Too many suds after cycle completes
customer_reviews.text: Still leaves considerable suds at bottom of dishwasher. Depending on water hardness this could be a problem. Great company and getting better with this iteration but still needs work.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best natural dishwasher soap period
customer_reviews.text: This is their 3rd variation of the dishwasher pods and they finally perfected the formula! These work AMAZING and I have tested it on all kinds of food and dirty dishes. Does not leave any residue, plates are shiny, and literally all the food is gone. I would highly recommend these dishwasher pods and the peace of mind that you are not eating chemicals off your plates from bleach and other crap in your traditional dishwasher detergents.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Z

customer_reviews.title: Strong & Safe
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly impressed. The dishwasher in my apartment is not a great appliance, and I've tried a range of mainstream and clean detergents/rinse aids. By far, this formulation outperforms everything else I've tried! My basis for this is cleaning power and glass clarity. It blasts through most gunk and leaves wine glasses near spotless, with no rinse aid - again, with a substandard dishwasher. In Chicago, we're in week 3 of CoVID-19 shelter-at-home, and I'm using these daily. Puracy is a true benefit to the kitchen! Note: I'd originally picked up the liquid dish soap @ Target, and it also cleans wine glasses better than Dawn Platinum. Whatever they're doing WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: C. Domrzalski

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch?
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the first bag received. Second bag: two washes in a row have caused excess foam during the wash, to the point that the dishwasher would not complete its cycle. I spent hours troubleshooting my dishwasher (Maytag) and found nothing wrong with it. That’s when it dawned on me to check the lower rating reviews on Amazon for this product, and I see I’m not the only one.
customer_reviews.author: AKT

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to use healthier products. I was skeptical about natural dishwasher tabs because my dishes get very dirty! I have a husband and 3 boys, we can do some eating!! Lol These did a really good job! The glasses are very clean with no film on them. I did not use jet dry. Also the kitchen aid mixing bowl had left over dough from homemade bread sticks and as you can see it's perfectly clean! I will continue to buy this product. I like that it's not leaving chemicals on our dishes that is going in our bodies!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Causes bubbles in the bottom of the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because it was a natural dishwasher soap, but it caused bubbles all over inside our dishwasher, and leaking out the sides onto our kitchen floor. We thought we must have put something in that had regular dish soap on it (we know that can cause serious bubbles in a dishwasher). Cleaned it all out, and tried again. Same thing happened. Used new soap and it was fine. Should have thrown out these dishwasher pods, but didn’t. Accidentally used one today again, and it happened again. Not a good detergent at all! 0 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Brissette

customer_reviews.title: Too many soap suds in soft water, will cause flooding
customer_reviews.text: Ok, great non-toxic, non odor product that does clean better than anything I've used before. HOWEVER, the sealed packets are too much soap for soft water. I learned the hard way as it caused too much suds to make my dishwasher leak all over my new hardwood flooring. I had ServPro come to mitigate the damage hopefully without having to take up the floor. This was the worst decision I've ever made
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the great reviews, I really wanted this product, as we try to reduce the use of chemicals as much as possible. I even began with a subscription order because I was sure this would be great. Maybe I'm doing something wrong. Each time we've tried these pods (3 or 4 times, just to make sure it wasn't my imagination), our dishwasher stops working. I have no idea why. Between tries, we used another brand and all was fine. If anyone has any ideas or suggestions, please tell me. Sorry I can't give this a 5-star review.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Woman

customer_reviews.title: For MCS, not perfect, but better
customer_reviews.text: Everyone began to notice the fumes from the cascade we have been using for years but for me with my chemical allergies it became unbearable. These tabs are completely odorless to everyone else. For me there is not so much a smell as an irritation like with vinegar or citrus but it is nothing compared to the cascade . I just make sure I am not in the kitchen when it is running - better safe than sorry. The dishes seem clean as ever and they have no odor (although even with cascade I never noticed problems with chemical odor on the dishes after washing)
customer_reviews.author: BookWorm

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this but it was just not working
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these. I love every single Puracy product I’ve ever used- multipurpose cleaner, stain remover, baby wash, hand soap, etc. But gosh this stuff was just awful. It made my dishwasher overflow with so much soap and bubbles it was a mess. I thought it was me so I tried loading my dishwasher differently (less stuff) but just nothing made it better. Maybe if they try a new formula I’ll give it a try but this one never again.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product but I hate it so much , I tried it few times and I follow advice on other reviews but I just don’t like it . Dishes come out clean but with soap residue . I could always put plastic dishes before and they come out just fine with seven generation dish washing soap but with this one they all turn white and I try to hand wash them again and they are just ruined . Returning this product .
customer_reviews.author: Erika Flannery

customer_reviews.title: Foam causes loud washer cycles.
customer_reviews.text: Had a similar experience to other users - this product gets really foamy. In the case of our dishwasher this didn't lead to it overflowing, but the whole cycle was much louder and the pump was alarmingly so. I was worried extended use of this might wear out the dishwasher. Not to mention the glasses came out not very clean. On the plus side it seemed to work fine on the other dishes.
customer_reviews.author: lo_dash

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple all natural products. They always left a white film and I assumed it was our water. We would have to dump a large amount of vinegar at the bottom of the dishwasher, or do multiple rinse cycles with vinegar to remove the film. The other detergent would also create a film on any leftover food. This product is amazing. No white film and incredibly clean dishes. Like you can put them in with a little food and they will come out spotless. No more vinegar, extra soaks, etc. This is the only product I’ve found that works and it natural
customer_reviews.author: ADBaby

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaning bio detergent and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, the best “green” detergent I have used. It actually gets my dishes just as clean as the chemical-laden brands. As stated in the directions, no need to rinse the dishes (less water usage), just scrape off large bits of food. I even tested it by letting the remnants of guacamole and pasta sauce dry out overnight in their respective bowls, and the came out perfectly clean. I’ve tried the other major bio brands and this just works better. No water spots, just clean dishes and silverware. Worth the cost, no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: AIM

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it but Floods My Machine Every Time
customer_reviews.text: Every time I've used this, my dishwasher has flooded. My dishwasher is under six month old. I've used Ecos gel without issue (for years with the new and old machine). It's either too much soap in a pack, or the soap is too sudsy. I don't know. I even cut a pack and used only half the soap. That worked once, but the next time it flooded. I'm done with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: j-me

customer_reviews.title: No problems with Puracy in a 2017 Bosch.  In fact, I'm delighted.
customer_reviews.text: I am (with only one load washed so far) thoroughly pleased with the results using Puracy Auto Dish Tabs. Everything (including plastic items, stainless utensils, plates and bowls, and glassware) came out clean and sparkly, with no undissolved globs, no spots (I do use a rinsing agent), no gooey bits. The best thing: NO STINK! I cannot stand the smell of the top-of-the-line Finish pods I'd been using. Even going into the cabinet where the Finish container is zipped tightly closed nearly knocks me off my feet. No fragrance is a big improvement, and without a sacrifice in cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: vanKliban

customer_reviews.title: Best dishwashing pods, best price, safe for us and environment
customer_reviews.text: I am in the process of switching our household over to healthful products for my family and the environment— but I don’t like to sacrifice the quality of the job that harsh chemicals do! I was hesitant to try these, but they are true to the other reviews. These absolutely beat out my cascade pods that I have been using for years! I am so impressed with the quality and the price! Can’t wait to keep using more Puracy products.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Residue:(
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like it. I'm in love with the company's other products like stain remover and shower gel. I've read the reviews about this dishwasher detergent being too soapy and leaving residues, but I decided to try anyway. I didn't get any extra bubbles, but it did leave a whitish residue on my black plastic meal-prep containers. I use rinse aid, but it didn't help. I had to manually rewash all the containers as they smelled like soap and were covered in thin layer of something white.
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina Pilyugina

customer_reviews.title: Love the ingredients, but this causes my dishwasher to leak!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love that this is one of very few truly non-toxic dishwasher detergent pods. However, upon using it 2 nights in a row, my dishwasher leaked major soap suds all over our floor. We assumed our dishwasher was broken....and then realized it might have been this new detergent. When we went back to our previous dishwasher soap, our dishwasher didn't leak any soap suds at all. Unfortunately, this formula just doesn't agree w/ our dishwasher and we can't use it or we will have soap suds everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Non-toxic Mama (in progress)

customer_reviews.title: My go-to dishwasher detergent
customer_reviews.text: I use several Puracy products and really like all of the ones that I've tried! These dishwasher detergent pods are easy to use, dissolve well, and clean as well as the toxic name-brand ones you'd buy at the grocery store. No problems with residue left behind or half-dissolved tablets like I've had with other brands. These do end up costing a little bit more per unit than a lot of loose powders, but the ease of use it worth it for my busy family.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Diane

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as leading name brands
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a dishwashing product that was environmentally friendly and didn't break the bank. It's still a little on the pricey side compared to the regular brands but I prefer something that doesn't completely poison the earth. One of my main concerns was without heavy chemicals, would this clean as well as FInish or Cascade brand names and it does. I don't notice a difference in ability to clean my dishes. So, kudos Puracy. It still comes in plastic packaging which sucks, but at least it's not a huge plastic box or bottle like some products. Overall, I like it. I'll recommend it until I find something with better packaging that doesn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: David Scott

customer_reviews.title: Lot of foam to point it leaked. May be a one off batch gone wrong
customer_reviews.text: Seems to create a lot of foam in Frigidaire dishwasher . I tried it twice assuming I may have accidentally added regular soap the first time. Both cases foam and water came out.
customer_reviews.author: Sri Pavan Vemuri

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent! My new go-to
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Cruelty free, solid value, and it leaves no residue on dishes regardless of light/heavy wash cycle. It does an impressive job, even on those extra tough things like oatmeal and rice. PLEASE BRING THIS BACK ♥️ On occasion, there is some residue left behind on/around the detergent compartment. This always seems to wash away on the next cycle, so it's likely caused by how our dishes are loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good for the environment!
customer_reviews.text: When I started using a dishwasher I was looking for a plant based eco-friendly detergent. Most such packs came wrapped in plastic which just defeats the whole purpose! I was happy to come across Puracy which had pods not wrapped in plastic. My dishwasher has been happy with this and my utensils come out looking clean and not smelling weird. I have subscribed to this so I can have it every month! I wish they would start packaging the pods in a non-plastic box as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Non toxic, smells great works best!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a bit obsessed w toxins, dyes and parabens etc since trying to get pregnant w my first kid a few years ago. (I was shocked to learn about endocrine disrupters!) Since then, I’ve learned that it’s sadly difficult to find cleaners without above toxins that actually work. These DO! (And you don’t feel like you need to re-re-re-rinse to get the scary chemicals off of your babies’ bottles, for example.) highly rec.
customer_reviews.author: CJK

customer_reviews.title: This is LEGIT!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is LEGIT! I gave up on finding a natural dishwasher detergent that actually worked and went back to using Cascade Complete. After a while, I just felt like I really needed to look at natural again. I bought this bc if reviews and after the first was I was blown away! SO mich better than the Cascade! Better than any detergent I’ve used before. It got my silver plated silverware sooo sparkly and shiny. And no residents. A+!!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like so badly
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these dishwasher pods from Puracy so badly! I love all their other cleaning products but not this one. I felt like it didn't get my dishes clean enough, there was always food residue left on my dishes, even with Jet Dry in my dishwasher. It also left a white powdery residue on my pots and pans. I never felt like my dishes were as clean as when I use the cascade platinum pods.
customer_reviews.author: Annabel

customer_reviews.title: Opposite of claims on packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for baby bottles so that there were less harsh chemicals and it states they are good even in hard water (which we have). I have never been so disappointed with something so much. These left a residue on everything and not just a slight residue like o felt it and you could blatantly see how unclear any plastic was. Washed again with my regular cheap generic Walmart brand and got rid of the film. Not sure how they can claim to be all of the things it most certainly is not. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Breathing easier
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this. I had used a popular brand full of harmful chemicals that smelled horrible. Even my dishes came out smelling awful. Once I used this, my dishes came out clean and I knew they didn’t have bad chemicals on them. Puracy works for my dishes and my families health. I will keep rebuying. The packet itself does not leave residue on hands and is simple to use. Even the resealable bag doesn’t smell bad.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: It Works- Will Continue Using!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second purchase with this product and I'm incredibly impressed! It was the first ever greener dishwasher pods I've used (used Cascade Complete and Finish before), and it works just as good if not better than those! $16 may seem like a lot to pay when the alternatives are typically under 10, but it lasted me a full 5 months of use (granted I run the dishwasher about once or twice a week) so money wise its better in the long run. 1000% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amiyaz

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and natural can't go wrong with that
customer_reviews.text: Best I've used simply because it works great but is natural and doesnt leave weird smells after wash! Also when the dishwasher is packed full it cleaned everything! I also love that they are a charitable company that gives and also has a good quality affordable and environmentally conscious product. This is my go to now!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Delfino

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about buying/trying another "natural" dishwasher detergent, because the previous ones I have tried have not been successful at getting the dishes very clean. I am very pleased that I did decide to give this one a go tho, as it has surpassed the cleaning power of my former, non natural alternative! Wonderfully clean dishes! Great product! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: shootoo

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher Leaked - Not Worth the Risk
customer_reviews.text: Like some others have reported, these caused our dishwasher to leak water and soap all over the kitchen floor. Opened the door and found suds all inside. We have a Bosch dishwasher and have never had this problem with other tablets.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kozin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Like many I got tired of detergent packs/pods being wrapped individually inside a bigger box/bag and was looking for a natural product that used less packaging and was comparable in price point to my previous product. So far this product has done a wonderful job of cleaning. The only reason I give them 4 stars is for the exterior bag being plastic as I'd love them better if they used a cardboard box to hold the packs.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend these pods
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand this product-- you're not supposed to rinse off food before using this pod. Weird. I tried with and without rinsing, and it leaves the WORST film on all my dishes. Especially the glasses. There is no smell/scent to the pods. I've tried half the pack and it hasn't improved. I switched to a different free/clear pod and it was a world of difference. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EK Inc

customer_reviews.title: Great eco friendly product
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this brand after not being thrilled with Cascades new eco friendly dishwasher detergent. This one was reasonably priced so I wanted to try it. I love that it doesn't have that strong chemical smell that Cascade has. It also is getting my dishes clean, even with our hard water! I haven't noticed any residue or anything. I feel better about using this as it has less chemicals which is better for my family and the environment! Win win ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best natural detergent so far!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using seventh generation as a greener alternative to most commercially available products. My issue had been that there seems to be a bit of a residue that can't be remedied with a rinsing agent. Did a search on Amazon for green dishwasher tabs and Puracy came up. Took the chance and I'm pleasantly surprised. If this is as green as they claim, this product is amazing. No residue and my glasses shine without the need of a rinse aid. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MyWildIdeas

customer_reviews.title: Left a white film on dishes
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted to love this product as we live piracy hand and bath soaps. The dishwasher detergent left a white film all over our dishes every time we use it. The only way to not have the white film was to add lemishine in with the puracy. We do have well water with a softener. I will just buy the lemishine dishwasher detergent next time instead.
customer_reviews.author: BigD38

customer_reviews.title: As Avdertised
customer_reviews.text: I've been using another natural dish washing soap, which was doing good, but left some white residue on the bottom of my wine glasses. I gave this one a shot and it works amazing. Yes, there is a tiny bit of suds in the bottom, but my other soap did too. No white residue! I did contact Puracy after I got my Amazon order and gave them the lot # to confirm it was the new formula since the old one with issue is still be circulated.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Good unscented detergent
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great value non-scent detergent. I have been using this for a year. I am happy with the quality. Although recent change makes the packet better so it won’t torn, but now the packets are stuck together, and lots of bubbles still left after one cycle. Furthermore now solid stuff (yogurt and egg) won’t come off well. I see the company’s constant effort for improvements. Hope they fix these issues. Again, still I like this product.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great, but keep them dry
customer_reviews.text: Update: most of these worked fantastic, but as we got to the bottom of the bag many of the pods were hardened and the plastic seemed thicker. These harder pods didn't dissolve propely in the dishwasher and we had to re-run several cycles. We also had a few cycles that created way too many suds and leaked out of the dishwasher. Again, this only happened at the end of the bag with the hardened pods. Overall still great pods and I will be buying again. Just keep them in a Tupperware to keep them from getting wet and hardening!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Edit: second bag —-it’s awful!!! All of my glass comes out extremely stained and with a layer of “dust”. I’ve tried calling Puracy, but to no avail as nobody calls me back. I’m extremely disappointed. They clearly changed their formula!! Now I need to figure out how to get all my stuff cleaned and free of spots. Ugh!! First review: Will not use anything else from here on out. Leaves my dishes clean and without residue. Even my dishwasher looks cleaner. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent, cleans dishes and leaves glasses squeaky clean with no residue.
customer_reviews.text: Our dishes are sparkling and squeaky clean! I was hesitant to buy this because of some of the negative reviews, but I’m glad I did! This detergent is great at cleaning our dishes, with no streaks or film left behind. Best of all is that they don’t test animals and it’s fragrance free (because I don’t want my dishes to smell like soap).
customer_reviews.author: Zoey C. Pantscowitz

customer_reviews.title: I approve
customer_reviews.text: This were really, really good at first then they started to leave a white film on some dishes. I ended up spending an extensive amount of time deep cleaning my dishwasher, but they continued to leave the film. I started pouring distilled vinegar over pouch inside the dispenser to help pre-dissolve them, and this has helped significantly.
customer_reviews.author: NancyDrool

customer_reviews.title: They don't work for all dishwashers
customer_reviews.text: These don't work in all dish washers. I wish I knew why or what the problem was, but just one tab made mine overflow with water and bubbles. I have to use this crappy Cascade detergent liquid crap in mine. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: It was ok
customer_reviews.text: I have an autoimmune disorder and I have been working to keep harsh chemicals out of our house, and especially out of our mouths:) This product came highly recommended but I have had problems with these tabs leaving a gross white film on my dishes resulting in another wash cycle. If you are looking for a great chemical free product for your dishwasher I suggest using the method brand they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrid

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My dishwasher is fairly old, but these work wonderfully! There's basically no scent...which is great for my allergies! I'm thankful for products that allow me to use modern conveniences with minimal impact to the environment and without causing my environmental allergies to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah St. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a liquid detergent until I switched over to the Puracy dish tabs. These are amazing at cleaning all types of dishes, glasses, and silverware. It has never left behind a film and the dirtiest of dishes always comes out clean. Most importantly, it has simple ingredients I can trust! Very pleased with my purchase so far!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: These work great
customer_reviews.text: My dishes came out really nice with these. I bought them because my brand/form is not available. I get powder in cardboard to reduce my plastic use. Apparently, so do a lot of people these days. As far as substitutes go, this is a good one, plastic notwithstanding. Nontoxic, cleans great.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe something so natural could wash my dishes better than cascade. I’ve spent a lot of money on the best dishwasher tabs just to make sure that my dishes were getting clean. Not only are these natural and free of all the harsh toxic chemicals but they even clean better. The best out there!!
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Major suds after the cycle
customer_reviews.text: Major suds in the bottom of the dishwasher. Tried it 5 times and always the same. Dont know if it matters, but the dishwasher is Miele... has never happened with any other powder/liquid/pod. Im i love with all other puracy products (and i use them ALL, i mean it) just not sure about this one...
customer_reviews.author: Vaida

customer_reviews.title: Heck yeah hardwater has nothing on these pods.
customer_reviews.text: Hard water hallelujah! I’ve not been able to resolve the hard water spots on dishes until I tried this. Amazing is nothing short of how well this works in hard water. Plastic still has an issue but I’ll accept that norm. (I’ve yet to do the cup of vinegar in my new dishwasher, if that improves results, I’ll post a follow up. If not, still highly recommend these pods.)
customer_reviews.author: T. Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Sticking to Cascade Platinum
customer_reviews.text: I normally Cascade Platinum pods. I've used Cascade for a while and never really tried other brands. Due to Covid, they weren't readily available on Amazon so I decided to try these. Big mistake. They leave watermarks and the dishes don't feel smooth and clean. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creates way too much foam
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. I have a new dishmachine and when using this product it creates so much foam that foam and water spill out on to the floor. I have used this product with and without vinegar with the same result. Really wanted to love this product for its natural ingredients, but the after effects are not worth it! Update: Puracy had great customer service and replaced the product & refunded the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been switching to more organic products around my house. At first, I was worried I'd be sacrificing quality, but this isn't the case at all! No streaks and my dishes come out at clean as ever. Super happy with this detergent, will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, but issues
customer_reviews.text: By far the best pods I’ve used in terms of pure cleaning power. Doesn’t matter if the dishes or pans have baked on goods, it comes off the first time. Now to the bad, the one time I put my dishwasher on the quick wash vs heavy duty, bubbles came out of the washer and onto the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Chris94

customer_reviews.title: Love these dishwasher pods!
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great! I have tried several more natural dishwasher detergents in the past few months and have been really disappointed in each of them. They haven’t left the dishes clean, but have left streaking and sometimes the dishes were still dirty. These have been great so far though! Dishes have no streaking or cloudiness and are clean! Will definitely be ordering more of these!
customer_reviews.author: suemartrob

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this product. I have tried several all natural dishwasher detergents and none would work well, until I tried these. The work great, just as well or better than the regular chemical name brand kind, and I feel safe knowing my family is being exposed to chemical residue. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best sulfate free I've found.  Bring it back!
customer_reviews.text: Heart broken that it's no available. Please get it back. When you find a great product, keep it coming. I'm violently allergic to sulfates and finding this took hours of research. And has saved me hours of hand washing. Their laundry detergent is fantastic, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Williams

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I was looking for a safer dishwasher detergent with less packaging that also does the job. This is it! I tried another 'safer' brand and it was awful. My husband asked me why I didn't buy this one again. This is our new go-to brand. We've been delighted with other Puracy products, too, particularly the soap refills.
customer_reviews.author: RJinMN

customer_reviews.title: Suds suds suds
customer_reviews.text: Bought this once since our normal dishwasher detergent was out-of-stock. One load was fine. Second load, I had a dishwasher full of suds and suds literally pouring out the front of my Miele dishwasher. Took me several empty rinse cycles to get all the suds out. The rest of the bag went in the trash. I'm just luck I caught it before it damaged my hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Banya

customer_reviews.title: 20% of the pods were broken & unusable
customer_reviews.text: Out of the 50 pods, 9 were broken and unusable upon delivery. I normally love Puracy products but will not buy their dish pods again since they clearly can not withstand shipping. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: haleigh m.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my newborn’s bottles but was not too impressed with the results. I also had a couple of them not dissolve in the dishwasher so had to re-run it again and it’s very inconvenient when you have limited time to get things done
customer_reviews.author: Shot Caller, Top Baller!

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: People trust the industry to much. They believe that what is on the shelves to buy is safe for your family, it is not. I do use a scrubber on my dishes before placing them in dishwasher. I cannot vouch for how well it works with stuck on food, I can tell you it works great for my needs. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Far superior to name brand diswasher detergent. Does not leave residue even with very hard water. Packets disolve completely during the cycle and dishes sparkle when finished. I used to have a "wet-dog smell" remaining on the dishes and what felt like a slimy film when I tried to rinse the smell away. That has completely disappeared using this product. Dishes sit about 2 days before I run the dishwasher and they come out completely clean. The package has lasted me 5 full months. I am thrilled with this product.
customer_reviews.author: azbirdlvr

customer_reviews.title: Really Clean!
customer_reviews.text: A family member told me I should try these, after watching me rinse/clean every dish before placing in my dishwasher. I still lightly rinse my dishes, but I am not sure I really need to. The dishes seem so much cleaner. Glad I made the switch from Cascade to Puracy!
customer_reviews.author: retiredinmiami

customer_reviews.title: Great, and nontoxic!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the cleanliness of this dishwasher pod and how nontoxic it is. It has never left any residue and our dishwasher is new. It’s a great purchase for those who want to use more nontoxic/clean products in their home!
customer_reviews.author: travis s thompson

customer_reviews.title: Gentle yet very effective
customer_reviews.text: We always used Cascade Platinum with our Bosch dishwasher as it was very effective with stuck on dirt. However, it was quite harsh on some metals like aluminum. We tried Puracy as a natural alternative but frankly quite skeptically. It turned out that Puracy is just as effective if not better and is gentle with metals including aluminum . Just ordered a second bag and plan to use only this from now.
customer_reviews.author: Morpheus

customer_reviews.title: Dirty dishes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this detergent for a week or two. I’ve had multiple loads come out with many dishes in each load still dirty. I take good care of my washer and have not had this issue with other detergents. I love Puracy, but will probably not purchase their dish detergent again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super clean, no toxic chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: Puracy products have been my staple for cleaning products for years now, and these dishwasher pods are my newest addition! These clean my dishes better than most name-brand pods, and do so without harsh chemicals! I’ve tried other natural cleaning brands in the dishwasher and they did not do a good job, but Puracy does!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Tomback

customer_reviews.title: Clean Dishes, Green Planet
customer_reviews.text: Over the last year I have been switching all of my household products over to "Natural" and plant-based cleaners from the traditional brands and PURACY is one of my favorites! I was reluctant to give up my go to dishwasher detergent because opening the dishwasher to less than clean dishes is possibly the worst thing that can happen in the kitchen but I am happy to report that these little Puracy Platinum Dishwasher Pods do not disappoint! You can switch without worry and your dishes will be spotless and without residue.
customer_reviews.author: Blahblahblah

customer_reviews.title: Great when the pod dissolves
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent - when it dissolves that is - this last batch had several that didn’t however. The whole cycle ran and I would find the pod on the bottom of the washer, still whole. I’ll still buy them though since when it works, it works way better than other brands. Shiny glassware and no residue. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: nymorningstar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dishwasher pellets
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find these dishwasher pellets. Our dishwasher is constantly running with two little kids. I love that these don’t have harsh chemicals or residue so I don’t worry about my kids eating off of their plates. It truly gets things clean too! We aren’t the best about pre-washing but these still get things sparkly clean! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: nicoleindc

customer_reviews.title: Best natural DW detergent I've tried!
customer_reviews.text: I was using Melaleuca Diamondbrite with Lemishine booster, which had been the best natural product I'd used until I tried Puracy. Puracy worked wonderfully even without the Lemishine booster. I couldn't believe how clean everything came out the first time I used it! Melaleuca never got everything clean, there were always things that needed re-washed. Puracy gets it all! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Ten

customer_reviews.title: Serendipitous Find! Absolutely love how it cleans and leaves no residue & smell.
customer_reviews.text: After using many other natural/plant based dishwasher detergents, I was expecting this to be equally good, but it turned out to be great. Just scrap the food and put your dishes in the washer, tear the pouch and let the powder to its magic. Clean (even after heavily stuck food and leaves no residue or smell). Absolutely happy. On to subscribe & save option now. Yeah! Packaging could be a bit more eco-friendly with maybe a plant based soluble wrap on individual pod.
customer_reviews.author: Neel

customer_reviews.title: Super soapy
customer_reviews.text: I wish these worked better because we were sold on the environmental factor. Many times it left a very soapy residue on the bottom rack of our dishwasher and we had to start another rinse cycle to get the suds off. Never had that issues with any other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Was great at first but then lots of foam and water started to leak...
customer_reviews.text: The first bag of packs was great, it cleaned the dishes much better than any other dishwasher soap we have used in the past. With the second bag the dishwasher (one year old Kenmore machine) started to leak each time. It took me a while to figure out the issue... I borrowed a different brand of soap from a neighbor and the dishwasher was back to normal, so unfortunately we can't use the Puracy kind anymore. I still love all their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Noa

customer_reviews.title: No streaks, no leftovers, no problem!
customer_reviews.text: First of all it is hard to find quality dishwasher soap that does not leave a mark, streaks, or leftovers on "clean" dishes. The first use of the dishwasher detergent packs made me toss my leftover store brand packs. The detergent packs work wonderfully, and is worth every penny. As a matter of fact I'm saving money! I am super happy with my purchase and will be using this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging, does a great job cleaning dishes! I am very impressed so far and will be repurchasing! It's great finding a clean ingredient option that also works efficiently!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn P.

customer_reviews.title: Love all the Puracy products I have tried thus far...4 different things.
customer_reviews.text: Love your stuff. It REALLY works and it kind to my super sensitive skin and nose. The stain remover is amazing. It's gotten stains out that I have never removed before. Thus far: Hand Soap, Laundry Detergent and Stain Remover, and the Dishwasher Tabs. My Miele dishwasher loved them and so did my dishes. You have a fan.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE KROLL

customer_reviews.title: It's really pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Used to use finish but now some I said try this I tried it and it actually gets the dishes extremely clean does pretty good on grease and doesn't leave hard water marks so two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: These things are terrible! They leave a white filmy/powder residue on the dishes. I had to rewash my dishes several times to remove it and even had to throw away one of my fiesta bowls. They don’t clean the dishes either. If your looking for a more natural dishwasher tab, look someplace else!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Makes too much foam that it leaks through my dishwasher. I thought it was broken and called specialist to inspect it. The biggest disappointment is that it leaves powdery dust on dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. K

customer_reviews.title: Love a product that performs as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these packs because I'm using some other Puracy brand products that are sulfate free. I'm annoyingly allergic to sulfates (or sulphites) of any kind, and even though it SHOULD rinse off my dishes, I liked the thought of not buying a product I'm allergic to. I couldn't be happier with the performance of the enzyme packs. Dishes are crazy clean, no residue in the dishwasher. Whoo Hoo!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: They clean better than top brands
customer_reviews.text: Buy these! They out preform cascade and finish pods. They’ve worked every time I’ve used them, where the other brands left a bad residue in some dishes.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product - the worst dishwasher detergent I have ever used. The pods leave big clumps of undissolved detergent in the dishwasher ---sometimes in the detergent dispenser itself. I had to scrub out the dispenser with a brush to get the clumps out - and then run the machine again to clean out everything. I have found clumps of detergent in areas close to where the detergent drops. I wonder if it is going to damage my dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: ron k tanaka

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaning and natural
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We used to buy some most advertised brand but were not reqlly happy with that. This one cleans very well. We actually bought this just because it's natural. But its cleaning quality surprised us.
customer_reviews.author: Vugar Aliev

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!  It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! I’ve wanted something natural and effective that doesn’t break the bank for a long time. My dishwasher is older, and this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Moxxi

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I am kinda super bummed, I wanted these tow work out but they leave a white coat of film on my dishes. I have to wash them again in the sink, dishes like cups and bowls it leaves a film. I really wanted to stay away from the toxic detergent, not sure what I will use now.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah J.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ve done
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ve done lately switching to this, it's all natural and cleans well Pity I didnt research this when I just had my baby to limit all chemicals in house hold ....
customer_reviews.author: Madeira

customer_reviews.title: Everything Good - Ditto that
customer_reviews.text: This is everything good that has already been written. It really does clean well and no stricks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than any dishwasher packs or liquids I've ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a safe chemical-free alternative to regular dishwasher pods for washing baby bottles and sippy cups in a dishwasher, and this stuff is incredible! Our regular dishes and baby bottles are squeaky clean without any residue. We were using Cascade and Kirkland brands prior to finding this product and have completely switched over to Puracy.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These are phenomenal - totally on par with those more toxic brands. No heavy scent, just really clean dishes with absolutely zero residue on glasses. These are the only ones I’ll use now!
customer_reviews.author: sarahz

customer_reviews.title: Great Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the weird odor that other dishwasher packs have. These pods have a clean, fresh smell and the dishes come out remarkably clean. I have had no issues with the pods and both dishes and dishwasher are clean and fresh smelling with no residue.
customer_reviews.author: Evertoth

customer_reviews.title: Did not remove water spots
customer_reviews.text: It did not take care of our water spotting issue at all. Dishes were not cleaned well, had to rehash by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sue P

product_meta.title: Puracy Platinum Dishwasher Detergent Pods, 50 Count, Natural Enzyme Powder Tablets, Spot & Residue-Free Dish Packs, Free & Clear
feature_bullets: Plant-Powered Performance: Advanced plant-derived enzymes quickly target and break down stubborn foods and stains without the need to pre-soak or pre-rinse (scrape, don’t rinse)

No Spots or Residues: No matter how hard your water is, our 3rd generation formula will thoroughly clean and rinse free without any notable spots (note: some clear plastic materials should be wiped with towel to remove water droplets)

Use with All Dishwasher-Safe Items: Clear results on ceramic, baby bottles, toys, pots, pans, casserole dishes, glass, plastic, silicone, crystal, porcelain, metals, and any surface safe to be cleaned in the dishwasher
No Harsh Ingredients: No cocamidopropyl betaine, sulfates (SLS, SLES, SCS), bleach, perfume, dyes, petroleum-based ingredients, animal by-products (cruelty-free), or other nasty stuff
Pure Love Guarantee: If you don’t love it, contact us directly for a full refund (no questions asked); Plant-derived, hypoallergenic, gluten-free, biodegradable, Made in America
